sounds terrible compared to recent CD FLAC rips
I mean really bad, not just the typical vinyl needle pops, just the lack of dynamic range is appalling in these....my 2 cents

i understand alot of people are devoted to digital, or at leased say it sounds just as good as vinyl, i personally feel that vinyl is the true way to listen. obviosly when i record them their not going to be exactly what i hear at home, but i left in the clicks and crackle to give it that old school sound that i'm sure a few people want to hear, my uploads are for the vinly lovers.
also HUGE thanks to the 39 other people holdin on to this one! happy new year!
